data.title: The guy shoots animal for fun
data.text: Yes, I can't be objective about this place because the owner is such a jerk. He thinks shooting endangered African animals is a fun activity. And when I did go there, the sandwiches were just so so. Not much flavor at all.

data.title: A Place for Sandwiches
data.text: Great variety of sandwiches with different combinations of ingredients! The prices are good and the sandwiches size make them a value for money option!

data.title: Quick sandwich pick up on the way to my office
data.text: Always friendly, service very consistent. A perfect place to stop and get a freshly made sub. Unfortunately, I often miss lunch, so this place is just plain convenient!

data.title: Better than Subway
data.text:
Food seemed to be fresher.  Food is prepared very quick.

Good place if you are short on time and want a fresh sandwich.

data.title: Awesome BLT :o)
data.text: I love sandwiches, and this is my BLT fix place.  The music is not too loud, and the staff is very courteous.  Not mention, my BLT is prepared to my liking: easy mayo, easy dijon, easy lettuce, and easy peppers.  The bacon is thinly sliced, and deli cold, just the way I love it!  I go 'gaga' for the bread, and some days, someone does a phenomenal job baking it!  I love it crusty on the top, but not burnt!  I love sitting there, and people watch.  I dine at this place at all times of the day at least three times a week.  They do a very good job on deliveries,and party platters.

data.title: Great sandwich
data.text: Never had a bad meal. Service is always fast and friendly. Several locations make it an easy choice for lunch on the move.

data.title: Freaky Fast and good, but with TOO MUCH MAYO!
data.text:
JJ is a great place to grab a quick good quality sandwhich for cheap and on the go.  The staff is alwasy friendly.

My only complaint is the amount of mayo they use if you forget to say go light on mayo.

data.title: Avoid this place
data.text:
I received a gift certificate to Jimmy John's. My wife and I visited the "restaurant' on University Drive in College Station, TX. It was our first visit to a Jimmy John's. I ordered a BLT. It arrived in about one minute, wrapped in a clean white wrapper and quite cold. I took one bite and realized that the bacon was cold and limp. I believe it came directly from the fridge. 
I left the remainder on my "sandwich" on the table along with the torn-up gift card and left the place, never to return.

data.title: Nothing special
data.text: Sandwiches were bland. They were also light on the meat, too heavy on the lettuce. The Jimmy Johns in our home town is much better.

data.title: Worst Jimmy Johns
data.text: Let me start off by saying that I have been to many Jimmy Johns restaurants over the years and this one is the worst. I chose this location because it had a drive thru. The parking lot was only about half full and I was the only car in the drive thru. I had to keep saying HELLO into the speaker box before someone came on. After my order was taken I proceeded thru to the window and paid. I wasn't given a receipt with my CC but I was willing to over look that until I waited for almost 10 mins for my food. I ordered only 1 regular sandwich. As I was waiting in the drive thru I kept seeing several people leave with food. I will never eat at this location again. If you prefer a Jimmy Johns that lives up to their reputation then I suggest the location on Texas Ave.

data.title: Love it every time!
data.text: The absolute fastest food you will ever get. It's delicious, there are hardly ever any errors made with our orders and the food is usually ready before we even get done paying.

data.title: Firefighters are Welcome
data.text: the best sandwiches, excellent value and could eat a different sandwich daily. My favorite is the number #9.
